author: juergen
msg: The logger is now pluggable. use <slide logger="org.apache.slide.util.logger.SimpleLogger" logger-level="6"> or the standard  domain.xml file to get the default behaviour.

author: juergen
msg: if a node already exists during init phase it is linked to the father node anyway, to prevent loose of nodes.
